definition: lit. large smelting furnace/fig. the mixing of different ethnicities and cultures/Melting Pot

sentences.english: A molten metal moves from a crucible into a vacuum chamber through a tube.
sentences.chinese: 熔融金屬通過一根管子從熔爐進入真空室。

sentences.english: All the best allies to Yaka must be proven in the furnace of affliction.
sentences.chinese: 凡是雅卡的盟友都必須在戰火的熔爐裏接受試煉。

sentences.english: Many new immigrants set foot in this land ill-prepared to assimilate into the American melting pot.
sentences.chinese: 許多新移踏腳美國並未有準備同化入社會的大熔爐。

sentences.english: Both the structure and principles of design of an electrical furnace for melting enamel frit have been recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了電熔搪瓷瓷釉熔爐的結構及設計原理。

sentences.english: Scientists believe the pebbly phenomenon is caused by a melting-pot of specific weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 科學家認爲，這種現象是特定氣候條件下的熔爐效應。

sentences.english: It's like a big melting pot of everything.
sentences.chinese: 這裏就像一個大熔爐，裝下了一切的一切。

sentences.english: The main shop of the ferroalloy plan with two furnace pipes on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 鐵合金工廠的主車間，兩個熔爐煙囪從屋頂伸出。

sentences.english: The courtiers , having entered, brought furnaces and massy hammers and welded the bolts.
sentences.chinese: 這幫朝臣進得門來，便拿熔爐和巨型鐵錘焊死了門閂。

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金屬在熔爐裏發出灼熱的光。

sentences.english: They must have appeared first as crusts and clinkers .
sentences.chinese: 它們最初必然象麪包的外皮和熔爐裏的渣塊。

sentences.english: The fiery heart of Sorrow's Furnace is home to some of Tyria's most fearsome creatures.
sentences.chinese: 在悲哀熔爐著火的心臟地區，住著許多可怕的生物。

sentences.english: Rectifiers are the critical components in a smelter potline .
sentences.chinese: 整流器是熔爐電解槽中的關鍵組成部分。

sentences.english: Seared in the fiery furnace of this world.
sentences.chinese: 在這個世界的熾熱熔爐內被烤焦。

sentences.english: These elements are forged in the stars’ fiery nuclear furnaces.
sentences.chinese: 這些元素只能在恆星那可怕的核熔爐裏熔鑄而成。

sentences.english: Uther and the knights of the Silver Hand rescues Arthas at Hearthglen.
sentences.chinese: 烏瑟爾與銀手騎士團趕來，在熔爐谷解救了阿爾薩斯。

sentences.english: 'I'm confident about my numbers of what copper went into furnaces, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，對於有多少銅進了熔爐，我很有把握。

definition: see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to adjust one's head and turn one's face (idiom); cosmetic changes/Despite superficially new policies, the substance remains unchanged.
miniature version of sth/microcosm/epitome/(Tw) to microfilm
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
